name: irccloud-solarized
description: Use the solarized color scheme for irccloud chat.
additional_info:
This style replaces the default ("Dawn") color scheme with solarized-light. A dark version is planned; it will replace the dark ("Dusk") theme. If the style doesn't seem to be applying, go to the settings and select the Solarized theme.

At the moment, some elements of the UI (menu popups, etc.) are still unstyled, this is a work in progress.

If you find a bug or would like to contribute, please visit the GitHub repository.

Changelog

v20151124 - Reworked/improved buffer list (higher contrast selections, blue unread notifications), better irc color coverage.

v20151123 - Initial release, partial implementation of the solarized-light theme.
